verifyDialog.title: API Verification
verifyDialog.idleHint: Select a token and model to start verification.
verifyDialog.warning: This feature is in beta. When support is detected, it is highly likely to be genuine. When support is not detected, it may still be supported. Results are for reference only; rely on actual tool usage.
verifyDialog.requiresModelId: Enter a model id to run this test.
verifyDialog.unsupportedProbeForApiType: {{probe}} probe is not supported for this API type.

summaries.noToolCallDetected: No tool call detected (model may not support tools).
summaries.webSearchUnsupportedAnthropic: Web search probe is not supported for Anthropic endpoints.
summaries.webSearchUnsupportedForApiType: Web search probe is not supported for this API type.
summaries.webSearchRequiresExplicitSupport: Web search probe requires explicit API type support.
summaries.modelsProbeUnsupportedForApiType: Models probe is only supported for OpenAI-compatible APIs.
summaries.noModelIdProvidedToRunProbe: No model id provided to run probe.
summaries.noModelIdProvidedToRunProbes: No model id provided to run probes.
summaries.noModelAvailableToRunProbes: No model available to run probes.
